Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I'm a RSS/RO player and I wanted to install HumanStuff. Unfortunately, everything is okay except the kerbal skin tone. It's still green. Do you have any solutions? Any type of help would be highly appreciated. I have TextureReplacer, all dependencies, etc. I don't have any outtdated mods, they're all up to date.

Modded KSP Version 1.8.1

When you say the mods are "up to date" they may be the versions intended for 1.11.1/2 (and as a result wont work)
If this isn't the problem, Just find the kerbal skin file in the games code, and replace the stock one with the HumanStuff one (you will need to change the file name of the new skin to match the old stock texture though.
Hope it helps

3 hours ago, Rambow_Ninja94 said:

When you say the mods are "up to date" they may be the versions intended for 1.11.1/2 (and as a result wont work)
If this isn't the problem, Just find the kerbal skin file in the games code, and replace the stock one with the HumanStuff one (you will need to change the file name of the new skin to match the old stock texture though.
Hope it helps

Just solved it by myself, without your post. Anyway, I'll mark that that's answered. Thank you, everyone. This topic is now abandoned. Still thanks for trying to help

Edited April 23, 2021 by ShuttlePilot
